price: and We turned their cities upside down[35] and rained down on them stones of baked clay.
arabic: فَجَعَلۡنَا عَٰلِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ حِجَارَةٗ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
footnotes: [35] Their nature was twisted, so their punishment was of its like.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
